reviews.content:
iPhone X, 13.3

The tweak itself works. But the notification text is overload on top of the app title (the app name). And on long notifications, it scrolls for a little bit then goes back up before the notification text is finished scrolling.
Esta funcionando en ios 14.0.1 en mi iphone 8, lo que no funciona son los test banner que se tendría que corregir, por lo demás todo funcionando bien.
Note. The latest version doesn’t apply to LS/NC, only banners when the phone is unlocked.
Works fine for me iOS 14.3 unc0ver, iPhone 12 Pro
Doesn’t work on A12 iOS 12.4 the settings of tweak showing but when I enable some of options then try test banner doesn’t work and when I try exit settings the screen freeze then respiring
